long_description: For all-mountain riders, K2 Ryker snowboard boots offer a great fit, all-day comfort and easy-to-use Boa(R) closures. Single Boa(R) Coiler adjusts Ryker boot exteriors with a quick twist, while Conda single-pull lacing locks liners from the outside. Intuition Comfort Fit 3D stitched liners feature Ultralon(R), a flexible custom moldable EVA foam designed to resist pressure-related pack out. Moldable internal J-bars hold heels securely; footbed support is engineered into the liner bottoms, and EVA insoles are added for supportive comfort. Conda single-pull liner lacing uses comfortable textile webbing handles to close liners from outside the boots; easy wrapping design quickly locks and releases webbing. Asymmetric, articulating cuffs and 3D-formed tongues are supportive and durable. Boa Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. The Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering as well as exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. Low-profile rubber outsoles with lightweight, 3D-molded midsoles offer grip and durability.
